com.googlecode.kevinarpe.papaya.input
Class FileInputSource2

java.lang.Object
  com.googlecode.kevinarpe.papaya.input.FileInputSource2
All Implemented Interfaces:
InputSource2
@FullyTested
public final class FileInputSource2
extends Object
implements InputSource2

Encapsulates the characters of a file.

Author:
Kevin Connor ARPE (kevinarpe@gmail.com)
See Also:
ClassResourceInputSource2, StringInputSource2

Constructor Detail

FileInputSource2

public FileInputSource2(File filePath)
                 throws PathException
Constructs a new InputStreamReader with the default charset.

It is strongly recommended to always specify the charset, e.g., Charsets.UTF_8.

Parameters:
filePath - path to file
Throws:
NullPointerException - if path is null
PathException -
  • with reason PathExceptionReason.PATH_DOES_NOT_EXIST if path does not exist
  • with reason PathExceptionReason.PATH_IS_DIRECTORY if path exists, but is not a file
See Also:
FileInputSource2(File, Charset)

FileInputSource2

public FileInputSource2(File filePath,
                        Charset charset)
                 throws PathException
Constructs a new InputStreamReader with a custom charset.

Parameters:
filePath - path to file
charset - custom charset, e.g., Charsets.UTF_8
Throws:
NullPointerException - if path or charset is null
PathException -
  • with reason PathExceptionReason.PATH_DOES_NOT_EXIST if path does not exist
  • with reason PathExceptionReason.PATH_IS_DIRECTORY if path exists, but is not a file
See Also:
FileInputSource2(File)

FileInputSource2

public FileInputSource2(File filePath,
                        CharsetDecoder charsetDecoder)
                 throws PathException
Constructs a new InputStreamReader with a custom charset decoder. This may needed to decode pre-Unicode charsets, like Shift-JIS and and Big5/HKSCS.

Parameters:
filePath - path to file
charsetDecoder - customer charset decoder
Throws:
NullPointerException - if path or charsetDecoder is null
PathException -
  • with reason PathExceptionReason.PATH_DOES_NOT_EXIST if path does not exist
  • with reason PathExceptionReason.PATH_IS_DIRECTORY if path exists, but is not a file

FileInputSource2

public FileInputSource2(File filePath,
                        String charsetName)
                 throws PathException,
                        UnsupportedEncodingException
Constructs a new InputStreamReader with a custom charset name.

Parameters:
filePath - path to file
charsetName - name of custom charset, e.g., "UTF-8"
Throws:
NullPointerException - if path or charsetName is null
IllegalArgumentException - if charsetName is empty or only whitespace
PathException -
  • with reason PathExceptionReason.PATH_DOES_NOT_EXIST if path does not exist
  • with reason PathExceptionReason.PATH_IS_DIRECTORY if path exists, but is not a file
UnsupportedEncodingException
See Also:
FileInputSource2(File, Charset)
Method Detail

getByteStream

public InputStream getByteStream()
Always null.
Retrieves the byte-based stream. If this stream is null, the character-based stream must not be null.

Specified by:
getByteStream in interface InputSource2
See Also:
InputSource2.getCharacterStream()

getCharacterStream

public Reader getCharacterStream()
Always non-null.
Retrieves the character-based stream. If this stream is null, the byte-based stream must not be null.

Specified by:
getCharacterStream in interface InputSource2
See Also:
InputSource2.getByteStream()

toString

public String toString()
